abstract: Proposal by Huntington, Ca, lawyer Matthew G McLaughlin for voter initiative that mandates death for anyone who has sexual relations with someone of same gender raises scrutiny California's historically permissive voter initiative system.
lead_paragraph: The proposed referendum, which demands that anyone who has sexual relations with someone of the same gender be put to death, calls into question the state’s historically permissive voter initiative system.

headline.main: Gays Targeted in a California Initiative
headline.print_headline: All Gays Targeted in a California Initiative

snippet: The proposed referendum, which demands that anyone who has sexual relations with someone of the same gender be put to death, calls into question the state’s historically permissive voter initiative system.
